ayas.text: alif lām rā ۚ tilka āyātul kitābil mubīn
innā anzalnāhu qur-ānan `arabiyyal la`allakum ta`qilūn
naḥnu naquṣṣu `alayka aḥsanal qaṣaṣi bimā awḥaynā ilayka hādhal qur-āna wa in kunta min qablihi laminal ghāfilīn
idh qāla yūsufu li-abīhi yā-abati innī ra-aytu aḥada `ashara kawkaban wash shamsa wal qamara ra-aytuhum lī sājidīn
qāla yābunayya lā taqṣuṣ ru-yāka `alā ikhwatika fayakīdū laka kaydā ۖ innash shayṭāna lilinsāni `aduwwun mubīn
wakadhālika yajtabīka rabbuka wayu`allimuka min ta-wīlil-aḥādīthi wayutimmu ni`matahu `alayka wa`alā āli ya`qūba kamā atammahā `alā abawayka min qablu ibrāhīma wa is-ḥāq ۚ inna rabbaka `alīmun ḥakīm
laqad kāna fī yūsufa wa ikhwatihi āyātul lissā-ilīn
idh qālū layūsufu wa-akhūhu aḥabbu ilā abīnā minnā wanaḥnu `uṣbatun inna abānā lafī ḍalālin mubīn
uqtulū yūsufa awiṭ-raḥūhu arḍan yakhlu lakum wajhu abīkum watakūnū min ba`dihi qawman ṣāliḥīn
qāla qā-ilun minhum lā taqtulū yūsufa wa-alqūhu fī ghayābatil jubbi yaltaqiṭ-hu ba`ḍus sayyārati in kuntum fā`ilīn
qālū yā-abānā mā laka lā ta-mannā `alā yūsufa wa innā lahu lanāṣiḥūn
arsilhu ma`anā ghadan yarta` wayal`ab wa innā lahu laḥāfiẓūn
qāla innī layaḥzununī an tadh-habū bihi wa-akhāfu an ya-kulahudh dhi-bu wa-antum `anhu ghāfilūn
qālū la-in akalahudh dhi-bu wanaḥnu `uṣbatun innā idhal lakhāsirūn
falammā dhahabū bihi wa-ajma`ū an yaj`alūhu fī ghayābatil jubb ۚ wa-awḥaynā ilayhi latunabbi-annahum bi-amrihim hādhā wahum lā yash`urūn
wajā-ū abāhum `ishā-an yabkūn
qālū yā-abānā innā dhahabnā nastabiqu wataraknā yūsufa `inda matā`inā fa-akalahudh dhi-b ۖ wa mā anta bimu-minin lanā walaw kunnā ṣādiqīn
wajā-ū `alā qamīṣihi bidamin kadhib ۚ qāla bal sawwalat lakum anfusukum amrā ۖ faṣabrun jamīl ۖ wallāhul musta`ānu `alā mā taṣifūn
wajā-at sayyāratun fa-arsalū wāridahum fa-adlā dalwah ۖ qāla yābushrā hādhā ghulām ۚ wa-asarrūhu biḍā`ah ۚ wallāhu `alīmun bimā ya`malūn
washarawhu bithamanin bakhsin darāhima ma`dūdatin wakānū fīhi minaz zāhidīn

waqālal ladhish-tarāhu min miṣra līmra-atihi akrimī mathwāhu `asā an yanfa`anā aw nattakhidhahu waladā ۚ wakadhālika makkannā liyūsufa fil-arḍi walinu`allimahu min ta-wīlil-aḥādīth ۚ wallāhu ghālibun `alā amrihi walākinna aktharan nāsi lā ya`lamūn
walammā balagha ashuddahu ātaynāhu ḥukman wa`il-mā ۚ wakadhālika najzil muḥsinīn
warāwadat-hul latī huwa fī baytihā `an nafsihi waghallaqatil-abwāba waqālat hayta lak ۚ qāla ma`ādhallāh ۖ innahu rabbī aḥsana mathwāy ۖ innahu lā yufliḥuẓ ẓālimūn
walaqad hammat bih ۖ wahamma bihā lawlā an ra-ā burhāna rabbih ۚ kadhālika linaṣrifa `anhus sū a wal faḥshā-a ۚ innahu min `ibādinal mukhlaṣīn
wastabaqal bāba waqaddat qamīṣahu min duburin wa-alfayā sayyidahā ladal bāb ۚ qālat mā jazā-u man arāda bi-ahlika sū-an illā an yusjana aw `adhābun alīm
qāla hiya rāwadatnī `an nafsī ۚ washahida shāhidun min ahlihā in kāna qamīṣuhu qudda min qubulin faṣadaqat wahuwa minal kādhibīn
wa in kāna qamīṣuhu qudda min duburin fakadhabat wahuwa minaṣ ṣādiqīn
falammā ra-ā qamīṣahu qudda min duburin qāla innahu min kaydikunn ۖ inna kaydakunna `aẓīm
yūsufu a`riḍ `an hādhā ۚ wastaghfirī lidhanbik ۖ innaki kunti minal khāṭi-īn
waqāla niswatun fil madīnatim-ra-atul `azīzi turāwidu fatāhā `an nafsih ۖ qad shaghafahā ḥubbā ۖ innā lanarāhā fī ḍalālin mubīn

falammā sami`at bimakrihinna arsalat ilayhinna wa-a`tadat lahunna muttaka-an wa-ātat kulla wāḥidatim minhunna sikkīnan waqālatikh-ruj `alayhinn ۖ falammā ra-aynahu akbarnahu waqaṭṭa`na aydiyahunna waqulna ḥāsha lillāhi mā hādhā basharan in hādhā illā malakun karīm
qālat fadhālikunnal ladhī lumtunnanī fīh ۖ walaqad rāwadtuhu `an nafsihi fasta`ṣam ۖ wala-in lam yaf`al mā āmuruhu layusjananna walayakūnan minaṣ ṣāghirīn
qāla rabbis sijnu aḥabbu ilayya mimmā yad`ūnanī ilayh ۖ wa illā taṣrif `annī kaydahunna aṣbu ilayhinna wa-akun minal jāhilīn
fastajāba lahu rabbuhu faṣarafa `anhu kaydahunn ۚ innahu huwas samī`ul `alīm
thumma badā lahum min ba`di mā ra-awul-āyāti layasjununnahu ḥattā ḥīn
wadakhala ma`ahus sijna fatayān ۖ qāla aḥaduhumā innī arānī a`ṣiru khamrā ۖ waqālal-ākharu innī arānī aḥmilu fawqa ra-sī khubzan ta-kuluṭ ṭayru minh ۖ nabbi-nā bita-wīlih ۖ innā narāka minal muḥsinīn

qāla lā ya-tīkumā ṭa`āmun turzaqānihi illā nabba-tukumā bita-wīlihi qabla an ya-tiyakumā ۚ dhālikumā mimmā `allamanī rabbī ۚ innī taraktu millata qawmin lā yu-minūna billāhi wahum bil-ākhirati hum kāfirūn
wattaba`tu millata ābā-ī ibrāhīma wa is-ḥāqa waya`qūb ۚ mā kāna lanā an nushrika billāhi min shay-ī ۚ dhālika min faḍlillāhi `alaynā wa`alan nāsi walākinna aktharan nāsi lā yashkurūn
yāṣāḥibayis sijni a-arbābun mutafarriqūna khayrun amillāhul wāḥidul qahhār

mā ta`budūna min dūnihi illā asmā-an sammaytumūhā antum wa-ābā-ukum mā anzalallāhu bihā min sulṭān ۚ inil ḥukmu illā lillāh ۚ amara allā ta`budū illā iyyāh ۚ dhālikad dīnul qayyimu walākinna aktharan nāsi lā ya`lamūn
yāṣāḥibayis sijni ammā aḥadukumā fayasqī rabbahu khamrā ۖ wa-ammal-ākharu fayuṣlabu fata-kuluṭ ṭayru min ra-sih ۚ quḍiyal-amrul ladhī fīhi tastaftiyān
waqāla lilladhī ẓanna annahu nājin minhumadh-kurnī `inda rabbika fa-ansāhush shayṭānu dhikra rabbihi falabitha fis sijni biḍ`a sinīn
waqālal-maliku innī arā sab`a baqarātin simāniy ya-kuluhunna sab`un `ijāfun wasab`a sunbulātin khuḍrin wa-ukhara yābisāt ۖ yā-ayyuhal mala-u aftūnī fī ru-yāya in kuntum lirru-iyā ta`burūn
qālū aḍghāthu aḥlām ۖ wa mā naḥnu bita-wīlil-aḥlāmi bi`ālimīn
waqālal ladhī najā minhumā waddakara ba`da ummatin ana unabbi-ukum bita-wīlihi fa-arsilūn
yūsufu ayyuhaṣ ṣiddīqu aftinā fī sab`i baqarātin simāniy ya-kuluhunna sab`un `ijāfun wasab`i sunbulātin khuḍrin wa-ukhara yābisātin la`allī arji`u ilan nāsi la`allahum ya`lamūn
qāla tazra`ūna sab`a sinīna da-aban famā ḥaṣadtum fadharūhu fī sunbulihi illā qalīlan mimmā ta-kulūn
thumma ya-tī min ba`di dhālika sab`un shidādun ya-kulna mā qaddamtum lahunna illā qalīlan mimmā tuḥṣinūn
thumma ya-tī min ba`di dhālika `āmun fīhi yughāthun nāsu wafīhi ya`ṣirūn
waqālal-maliku-tūnī bih ۖ falammā jā-ahur rasūlu qālar-ji` ilā rabbika fas-alhu mā bālun niswatil lātī qaṭṭa`na aydiyahunn ۚ inna rabbī bikaydihinna `alīm

qāla mā khaṭbukunna idh rāwadtunna yūsufa `an nafsih ۚ qulna ḥāsha lillāhi mā `alimnā `alayhi min sū-ī ۚ qālatim-ra-atul `azīzil-āna ḥaṣ-ḥaṣal ḥaqqu ana rāwadtuhu `an nafsihi wa innahu laminaṣ ṣādiqīn
dhālika liya`lama annī lam akhunhu bil ghaybi wa-annallāha lā yahdī kaydal khā-inīn
wa mā ubarri-u nafsī ۚ innan nafsa la-ammāratun bis sū-i illā mā raḥima rabbī ۚ inna rabbī ghafūrun raḥīm
waqālal-maliku-tūnī bihi astakhliṣ-hu linafsī ۖ falammā kallamahu qāla innakal yawma ladaynā makīnun amīn
qālaj-`alnī `alā khazā-inil-arḍ ۖ innī ḥafīẓun `alīm
wakadhālika makkannā liyūsufa fil-arḍi yatabawwa-u minhā ḥaythu yashā-u ۚ nuṣību biraḥmatinā man nashā-u ۖ walā nuḍī`u ajral muḥsinīn
wala-ajrul-ākhirati khayrul lilladhīna āmanū wakānū yattaqūn
wajā-a ikhwatu yūsufa fadakhalū `alayhi fa`arafahum wahum lahu munkirūn
walammā jahhazahum bijahāzihim qāla-tūnī bi-akhin lakum min abīkum ۚ alā tarawna annī ūfil kayla wa-ana khayrul munzilīn
fa-in lam ta-tūnī bihi falā kayla lakum `indī walā taqrabūn
qālū sanurāwidu `anhu abāhu wa innā lafā`ilūn
waqāla lifityānihij-`alū biḍā`atahum fī riḥālihim la`allahum ya`rifūnahā idhan-qalabū ilā ahlihim la`allahum yarji`ūn
falammā raja`ū ilā abīhim qālū yā-abānā muni`a minnal kaylu fa-arsil ma`anā akhānā naktal wa innā lahu laḥāfiẓūn
qāla hal āmanukum `alayhi illā kamā amintukum `alā akhīhi min qabl ۖ fallāhu khayrun ḥāfiẓā ۖ wahuwa arḥamur rāḥimīn
walammā fataḥū matā`ahum wajadū biḍā`atahum ruddat ilayhim ۖ qālū yā-abānā mā nabghī ۖ hādhihi biḍā`atunā ruddat ilaynā ۖ wanamīru ahlanā wanaḥfaẓu akhānā wanazdādu kayla ba`īr ۖ dhālika kaylun yasīr
qāla lan ursilahu ma`akum ḥattā tu-tūni mawthiqan minallāhi lata-tunnanī bihi illā an yuḥāṭa bikum ۖ falammā ātawhu mawthiqahum qālallāhu `alā mā naqūlu wakīl

waqāla yābaniyya lā tadkhulū min bābin wāḥidin wadkhulū min abwābin mutafarriqah ۖ wa mā ughnī `ankum minallāhi min shay-ī ۖ inil ḥukmu illā lillāh ۖ `alayhi tawakkalt ۖ wa`alayhi falyatawakkalil mutawakkilūn

walammā dakhalū min ḥaythu amarahum abūhum mā kāna yughnī `anhum minallāhi min shay-in illā ḥājatan fī nafsi ya`qūba qaḍāhā ۚ wa innahu ladhū `il-min limā `allamnāhu walākinna aktharan nāsi lā ya`lamūn
walammā dakhalū `alā yūsufa āwā ilayhi akhāh ۖ qāla innī ana akhūka falā tabta-is bimā kānū ya`malūn
falammā jahhazahum bijahāzihim ja`alas siqāyata fī raḥli akhīhi thumma adhhana mu-adhhinun ayyatuhal `īru innakum lasāriqūn
qālū wa-aqbalū `alayhim mādhā tafqidūn
qālū nafqidu ṣuwā`al maliki waliman jā-a bihi ḥimlu ba`īrin wa-ana bihi za`īm
qālū tallāhi laqad `alimtum mā ji-nā linufsida fil-arḍi wa mā kunnā sāriqīn
qālū famā jazā-uhu in kuntum kādhibīn
qālū jazā-uhu man wujida fī raḥlihi fahuwa jazā-uh ۚ kadhālika najziẓ ẓālimīn

fabada-a bi-aw`iyatihim qabla wi`ā-i akhīhi thummas-takhrajahā min wi`ā-i akhīh ۚ kadhālika kidnā liyūsuf ۖ mā kāna liya-khudha akhāhu fī dīnil maliki illā an yashā-allāh ۚ narfa`u darajātin man nashā-u ۗ wafawqa kulli dhī `il-min `alīm
qālū in yasriq faqad saraqa akhul lahu min qabl ۚ fa-asarrahā yūsufu fī nafsihi walam yubdihā lahum ۚ qāla antum sharrun makānā ۖ wallāhu a`lamu bimā taṣifūn
qālū yā-ayyuhal `azīzu inna lahu aban shaykhan kabīran fakhudh aḥadanā makānah ۖ innā narāka minal muḥsinīn
qāla ma`ādhallāhi an na-khudha illā man wajadnā matā`anā `indahu innā idhal laẓālimūn

falammas-tay-asū minhu khalaṣū najiyyā ۖ qāla kabīruhum alam ta`lamū anna abākum qad akhadha `alaykum mawthiqan minallāhi wa min qablu mā farraṭtum fī yūsuf ۖ falan abraḥal-arḍa ḥattā ya-dhana lī abī aw yaḥkumallāhu lī ۖ wahuwa khayrul ḥākimīn
irji`ū ilā abīkum faqūlū yā-abānā innab-naka saraqa wa mā shahidnā illā bimā `alimnā wa mā kunnā lilghaybi ḥāfiẓīn
was-alil qaryatal latī kunnā fīhā wal `īral latī aqbalnā fīhā ۖ wa innā laṣādiqūn
qāla bal sawwalat lakum anfusukum amrā ۖ faṣabrun jamīl ۖ `asallāhu an ya-tiyanī bihim jamī`ā ۚ innahu huwal `alīmul ḥakīm
watawallā `anhum waqāla yā-asafā `alā yūsufa wabyaḍḍat `aynāhu minal ḥuzni fahuwa kaẓīm
qālū tallāhi tafta-u tadhkuru yūsufa ḥattā takūna ḥaraḍan aw takūna minal hālikīn
qāla innamā ashkū bathhī waḥuznī ilallāhi wa-a`lamu minallāhi mā lā ta`lamūn
yābaniyyadh-habū fataḥassasū min yūsufa wa-akhīhi walā tay-asū min rawḥillāh ۖ innahu lā yay-asu min rawḥillāhi illal-qawmul kāfirūn
falammā dakhalū `alayhi qālū yā-ayyuhal `azīzu massanā wa-ahlanaḍ ḍurru waji-nā bibiḍā`atim muzjātin fa-awfi lanal kayla wataṣaddaq `alaynā ۖ innallāha yajzil mutaṣaddiqīn
qāla hal `alimtum mā fa`altum biyūsufa wa-akhīhi idh antum jāhilūn
qālū a-innaka la-anta yūsuf ۖ qāla ana yūsufu wahādhā akhī ۖ qad mannallāhu `alaynā ۖ innahu man yattaqi wayaṣbir fa-innallāha lā yuḍī`u ajral muḥsinīn
qālū tallāhi laqad ātharakallāhu `alaynā wa in kunnā lakhāṭi-īn
qāla lā tathrība `alaykumul yawm ۖ yaghfirullāhu lakum ۖ wahuwa arḥamur rāḥimīn
idh-habū biqamīṣī hādhā fa-alqūhu `alā wajhi abī ya-ti baṣīran wa-tūnī bi-ahlikum ajma`īn
walammā faṣalatil `īru qāla abūhum innī la-ajidu rīḥa yūsuf ۖ lawlā an tufannidūn
qālū tallāhi innaka lafī ḍalālikal qadīm
falammā an jā-al bashīru alqāhu `alā wajhihi fartadda baṣīrā ۖ qāla alam aqul lakum innī a`lamu minallāhi mā lā ta`lamūn
qālū yā-abānas-taghfir lanā dhunūbanā innā kunnā khāṭi-īn
qāla sawfa astaghfiru lakum rabbī ۖ innahu huwal ghafūrur raḥīm
falammā dakhalū `alā yūsufa āwā ilayhi abawayhi waqālad-khulū miṣra in shā-allāhu āminīn

warafa`a abawayhi `alal-`arshi wakharrū lahu sujjadā ۖ waqāla yā-abati hādhā ta-wīlu ru-yāya min qablu qad ja`alahā rabbī ḥaqqā ۖ waqad aḥsana bī idh akhrajanī minas sijni wajā-a bikum minal badwi min ba`di an nazaghash shayṭānu baynī wabayna ikhwatī ۚ inna rabbī laṭīful limā yashā-u ۚ innahu huwal `alīmul ḥakīm
rabbi qad ātaytanī minal mulki wa`allamtanī min ta-wīlil-aḥādīth ۚ fāṭiras samāwāti wal-arḍi anta waliyyiy fid dunyā wal-ākhirah ۖ tawaffanī musliman wa-alḥiqnī biṣ ṣāliḥīn
dhālika min anbā-il ghaybi nūḥīhi ilayk ۖ wa mā kunta ladayhim idh ajma`ū amrahum wahum yamkurūn
wa mā aktharun nāsi walaw ḥaraṣta bimu-minīn
wa mā tas-aluhum `alayhi min ajr ۚ in huwa illā dhikrul lil`ālamīn
waka-ayyin min āyatin fis samāwāti wal-arḍi yamurrūna `alayhā wahum `anhā mu`riḍūn
wa mā yu-minu aktharuhum billāhi illā wahum mushrikūn
afa-aminū an ta-tiyahum ghāshiyatun min `adhābillāhi aw ta-tiyahumus sā`atu baghtatan wahum lā yash`urūn
qul hādhihi sabīlī ad`ū ilallāh ۚ `alā baṣīratin ana wa manit-taba`anī ۖ wasubḥānallāhi wa mā ana minal mushrikīn

wa mā arsalnā min qablika illā rijālan nūḥī ilayhim min ahlil qurā ۗ afalam yasīrū fil-arḍi fayanẓurū kayfa kāna `āqibatul ladhīna min qablihim ۗ waladārul-ākhirati khayrul lilladhīnat-taqaw ۗ afalā ta`qilūn
ḥattā idhas-tay-asar rusulu waẓannū annahum qad kudhibū jā-ahum naṣrunā fanujjiya man nashā-u ۖ walā yuraddu ba-sunā `anil qawmil mujrimīn
laqad kāna fī qaṣaṣihim `ibratun li-ulil-albāb ۗ mā kāna ḥadīthan yuftarā walākin taṣdīqal ladhī bayna yadayhi watafṣīla kulli shay-in wahudan waraḥmatan liqawmiy yu-minūn
